author: freeCodeCamp.org
description:
This comprehensive AWS Cognito course covering everything from User Pools and Identity Pools to OAuth 2.0 workflows and JWT authentication. Master integration with popular frameworks like React and Node.js while implementing role-based access control and securing APIs with Cognito authorizers. Gain practical experience through hands-on exercises, including building a secure file-sharing application using AWS Cognito, S3, and React.

💻 Github Repository: https://github.com/TrickSumo/CognitoCourse

❤️ Support for this channel comes from our friends at Scrimba – the coding platform that's reinvented interactive learning: https://scrimba.com/freecodecamp

⭐️ Chapters ⭐️
⌨️ (0:00:00) Course Introduction 
⌨️ (0:02:48) AWS Cognito User Pool Vs Identity Pool Vs IAM
⌨️ (0:10:32) AWS Cognito Userpool Complete Overview
⌨️ (0:27:18) OAuth 2.0 Workflow and Grant Types in Amazon Cognito
⌨️ (0:46:23) Secure OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code Grant in Cognito with PKCE and State Parameter 
⌨️ (0:51:00) JW
title: AWS Cognito Course – Authentication and Authorization
